mm_user_password.title: Password
mm_user_password.errorMsg: Password must have at least 5 characters

mm_user_email.errorMsg: Please enter Email in correct format(e.g: abc@mail.com)

OMS Entitlements.filter: where user_permission_name not like '%.SysConfig' AND user_permission_name not like '%.SSMOS'

user_permission_name.title: Permission
user_permission_name.query: select perm_id,perm_name, perm_group from ft_oms_permissions where perm_group != 'SysConfig' and perm_group != 'SSMOS' and perm_group != 'SSOMS' ORDER BY perm_name

Syscfg/MOS Entitlements.filter: where user_id like '%.%.%' and ( isActive != 'N' or isActive is null ) and (user_permission_name like '%.SysConfig' OR user_permission_name like '%.SSMOS')
